name: Beeneath The Earth
description:
A PUZZLE GAME ABOUT MAKING YOUR WAY THROUGHT A MAZE OF TUNELS AND COLLECT ALL THE  HONEY YOU FOUND FOR YOUR QUEEN.

Beeneath The Earth us a small  puzzle-game in which the player helps a little bee that has to collect all the honey it finds in the hive and take it back to its Queen.

Control:

You can play the game using just the Left-Mouse-Button, with it you can drag and drop the bee and slide the tunnels.

This game was developed by:

Emily Souza

Enezio Filho

Thierry Arnone
